query:
UPDATE users
            SET
                firstname = COALESCE($2, firstname),
                lastname = COALESCE($3, lastname),
                email = COALESCE($4, email),
                password = $5,
                updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
            WHERE
                user_id = $1
                AND deleted_at IS NULL
            RETURNING
                user_id ,
                firstname,
                lastname ,
                email,
                password,
                created_at,
                updated_at,
                deleted_at
